resources.string:
Hello this is About-Me App and this was made as a second project under the Kotlin learning program offered by Google. This project basically deals with the layout editing and the view binding associated with it. This project is helpful for learning such things easily and in a guided way. Let me tell you what all things have I learnt here in brief .
